remarks: Condition for two categories with the same base to have the same hom-sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
homfeq.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
homfeq.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
homfeq.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` C ) ) $.
homfeq.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` D ) ) $.
homfeq $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) <-> A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x H y ) = ( x J y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d ph x y $.
